description: The NSQIP_IMMUNOSUP_USE table contains the types of immunosuppressants used. The information is part of NSQIP registry submissions.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NSQIP_IMMUNOSUP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID of immunosuppressant use.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Corticosteroids


Anti-rejection/transplant immunosuppressants


Synthetic DMARDs/DMDs


Biologic DMARDs/DMDs


Other
